Package oop.polymorph

Class VignetteBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.polymorph.VignetteBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnualVignette, SingleDayVignette, TenDayVignette, TwoMonthsVignette
    public abstract class VignetteBase
extends java.lang.Object
    The VignetteBase class serves as a base class for vignettes. It provides common functionality and properties for all types of vignettes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.lang.String kfzType
      The type of the vehicle for which the vignette is issued.
      protected java.lang.String plate
      The license plate number associated with the vignette.
      protected java.util.Date startDate
      The start date of the vignette.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      VignetteBase​(java.util.Date startDate, java.lang.String kfzType)
      Constructs a VignetteBase object with the specified start date and vehicle type.
      VignetteBase​(java.util.Date startDate, java.lang.String kfzType, java.lang.String plate)
      Constructs a VignetteBase object with the specified start date, vehicle type, and license plate number.
